Class vrml.external.Node 
All Packages  Class Hierarchy  This Package  Previous  Index

Class vrml.external.Node 

java.lang.Object
   |
   +----vrml.external.Node
public class Node
extends Object
VRML External Java Interface to a VRML node

For example: 
 
   vrml.external.node n = browser.getNode("ROOT");

Node(Node)

getBxNode()
getEventIn(String)
get handle to an EventIn of this node
getEventOut(String)
get handle to an EventOut of this node
getInterfaceElement(int, int[], int[], String[])
query event type information of a specific interface element (blaxxunCC3d)
getName()
get node name of this node (blaxxunCC3d)
getNumInterfaceElements()
get number of interface elements (eventIn/Out/exposedFields/fields of this node (blaxxunCC3d)
getType()
Get a string specifying the type of this node.
getValueNode()
query the node this node evalutes to, (blaxxunCC3d) for Nodes created as a instance of a PROTO/EXTERNPROTO it would return the top-level node of the PROTO instance for non-Proto nodes it evalutes to this
setName(String)
set node name of this node (blaxxunCC3d)

Node 
  public Node(Node bxNode)

getBxNode 
  public Node getBxNode()
getType 
  public String getType()
Get a string specifying the type of this node. May return the name of a PROTO, or the class name
Returns:
class name e.g. "Transform"
getEventIn 
  public EventIn getEventIn(String name) throws InvalidEventInException
get handle to an EventIn of this node
Parameters:
name - name of the requested EventIn e.g. "set_translation" for a Transform node
Returns:
handle of eventIn, can be casted to specific EventIn type
getEventOut 
  public EventOut getEventOut(String name) throws InvalidEventOutException
get handle to an EventOut of this node
Parameters:
name - name of the requested EventOut e.g. "translation_changed" for a Transform node
Returns:
handle of eventOut, can be casted to specific EventOut type
getName 
  public String getName()
get node name of this node (blaxxunCC3d)
Returns:
name eg "My-Node" or "" if no name set
setName 
  public void setName(String newName)
set node name of this node (blaxxunCC3d)
Parameters:
newName - new name for the node browser.getNode(newName) may or may not return this node use browser.setNodeName(node,name) instead to enshure this
getNumInterfaceElements 
  public int getNumInterfaceElements()
get number of interface elements (eventIn/Out/exposedFields/fields of this node (blaxxunCC3d)
Returns:
number of interface elements
getInterfaceElement 
  public void getInterfaceElement(int index,
                                  int eventType[],
                                  int fieldType[],
                                  String name[])
query event type information of a specific interface element (blaxxunCC3d)
Parameters:
index - index of element (0 <= index < getNumInterfaceElements)
eventType - the eventType
fieldType - the field type
name - the name of the event / field
getValueNode 
  public Node getValueNode()
query the node this node evalutes to, (blaxxunCC3d) for Nodes created as a instance of a PROTO/EXTERNPROTO it would return the top-level node of the PROTO instance for non-Proto nodes it evalutes to this
Returns:
the value node
